name: Pride and Prejudice
desc: A timeless romance novel by Jane Austen, exploring themes of love and social standing.

name: Jane Eyre
desc: A gothic romance novel by Charlotte Brontë, following the life of the orphaned Jane Eyre.

name: Persuasion
desc: A romantic novel by Jane Austen about second chances and enduring love.

name: The Great Gatsby
desc: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that explores the American Dream and tragic love.

name: Wuthering Heights
desc: An intense tale of love and revenge by Emily Brontë, set on the Yorkshire moors.

name: The Night Circus
desc: A fantasy novel by Erin Morgenstern about a magical competition between two young illusionists.

name: Emma
desc: A lighthearted romantic comedy by Jane Austen, centered around the matchmaking Emma Woodhouse.

name: The Da Vinci Code
desc: A fast-paced mystery thriller by Dan Brown filled with secrets and historical intrigue.

name: North and South
desc: A romance and social novel by Elizabeth Gaskell, depicting love across class divides.

name: The Alchemist
desc: An inspiring story by Paulo Coelho about following your dreams and listening to your heart.

name: Me Before You
desc: A moving love story by Jojo Moyes about life, love, and unexpected journeys.

name: A Court of Thorns and Roses
desc: A fantasy romance by Sarah J. Maas blending magic, fae worlds, and forbidden love.

name: Gone Girl
desc: A psychological thriller by Gillian Flynn with twists and dark secrets.

name: Little Women
desc: A classic novel by Louisa May Alcott following the lives of the four March sisters.

name: It Ends with Us
desc: A contemporary romance novel by Colleen Hoover dealing with love and resilience.
